p: Gingerol is the general term of the pungent ingredients in Z. officinale, which is a mixture of many substances. Gingerols are not only the main components of characteristic spicy flavor, but also the main functional components of various biological activities. The structure of gingerols contains the 3-methoxy-4-hydroxyphenyl functional group.
